name: VacinAI
description:
A Game made for Wowie Jam 4 with theme "Collaborate With AI".

The goal of this game is to collect virus samples to augment the dataset used to train the AI that is researching a cure.

Controls

Movement: W, A, S, D or Arrows

Shoot: Space

Credits

Date: 12/08/22 ~ 15/08/22

Theme: Colaborate with AI

Programmer: Anderson Marques

Art: Wallisson Dantas

Font: Audiowide - Astigmatic

Sound: Sidearm Studios

Music: Jamendo SA
